introMisskey:
Vítejte! Misskey je otevřený a decentralizovaný microblogový servis.
"Poznámkami" můžete sdílet co se zrovna děje se všemi ve Vašem okolí. 📡
Pomocí "reakcí" můžete sdílet své názory a pocity na ostatní poznámky. 👍
Pojďte objevovat nový svět! 🚀
noAccountDescription: Tento uživatel zatím nenapsal svou biografii.
deleteAndEditConfirm: Jste si jistí že chcete smazat tuto poznámku a editovat ji? Ztratíte tím všechny reakce, sdílení a odpovědi na ni.
driveFileDeleteConfirm: Opravdu chcete smazat soubor "{name}"? Poznámky, ke kterým je tento soubor připojen, budou také smazány.
unfollowConfirm: Jste si jisti že už nechcete sledovat {name}?
exportRequested: Požádali jste o export. To může chvíli trvat. Přidáme ho na váš Disk až bude dokončen.
importRequested: Požádali jste o export. To může chvilku trvat.
pageLoadErrorDescription: This is normally caused by network errors or the browser's cache. Try clearing the cache and then try again after waiting a little while.
serverIsDead: Server neodpovídá. Počkejte chvíli a zkuste to znovu.
youShouldUpgradeClient: Pro zobrazení této stránky obnovte stránku pro aktualizaci klienta.
reactionSettingDescription: リアクションピッカーに表示するリアクションを設定するにゃ。
reactionSettingDescription2: Přetažením změníte pořadí, kliknutím smažete, zmáčkněte "+" k přidání
blockConfirm: Jste si jistí že chcete zablokovat tento účet?
unblockConfirm: Jste si jistí že chcete odblokovat tento účet?
suspendConfirm: Jste si jistí že chcete suspendovat tenhle účet?
unsuspendConfirm: Jste si jistí že chcete obnovit tenhle účet?
cacheRemoteFilesDescription: Zakázání tohoto nastavení způsobí, že vzdálené soubory budou odkazovány přímo, místo aby byly ukládány do mezipaměti. Tím se ušetří úložiště na serveru, ale zvýší se provoz, protože se negenerují miniatury.
flagAsBotDescription: Pokud je tento účet kontrolován programem zaškrtněte tuto možnost. To označí tento účet jako bot pro ostatní vývojáře a zabrání tak nekonečným interakcím s ostatními boty a upraví Misskey systém aby se choval k tomuhle účtu jako bot.
flagAsCatDescription: Vyberte tuto možnost aby tento účet byl označen jako kočka.
autoAcceptFollowed: Automaticky akceptovat následování od účtů které sledujete
followConfirm: Jste si jisti, že chcete sledovat {name}?
proxyAccountDescription: Proxy účet je účet, který za určitých podmínek sleduje uživatele na dálku vaším jménem. Například když uživatel zařadí vzdáleného uživatele do seznamu, pokud nikdo nesleduje uživatele na seznamu, aktivita nebude doručena instanci, takže místo toho bude uživatele sledovat účet proxy.
latestRequestSentAt: 直近のリクエスト送信
clearQueueConfirmTitle: Jste si jisti že zrušit všechny úlohy ve frontě?
clearQueueConfirmText: Any undelivered notes remaining in the queue will not be federated. Usually this operation is not needed.
clearCachedFilesConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete all cached remote files?
blockedInstancesDescription: List the hostnames of the instances that you want to block. Listed instances will no longer be able to communicate with this instance.
noteDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
intro: Instalace Misskey byla dokončena! Prosím vytvořte admina.
removeAreYouSure: Jste si jistí že chcete smazat "{x}"?
deleteAreYouSure: Jste si jistí že chcete smazat "{x}"?
keepOriginalUploadingDescription: Saves the originally uploaded image as-is. If turned off, a version to display on the web will be generated on upload.
uploadFromUrlDescription: URL adresa souboru, který chcete nahrát
uploadFromUrlMayTakeTime: Může trvat nějakou dobu, dokud nebude dokončeno nahrávání.
remoteUserCaution: Tyto informace nemusí být aktuální jelikož uživatel je ze vzdálené instance.
themeForLightMode: Vzhled pro použití ve světlém režimu
themeForDarkMode: Vzhled k použití v tmavém režimu
syncDeviceDarkMode: Synchronizovat tmavý vzhled s nastavením Vašeho systému
circularReferenceFolder: The destination folder is a subfolder of the folder you wish to move.
hasChildFilesOrFolders: Since this folder is not empty, it can not be deleted.
whenServerDisconnected: When losing connection to the server
reloadConfirm: Would you like to refresh the timeline?
disablingTimelinesInfo: Adminstrators and Moderators will always have access to all timelines, even if they are not enabled.
proxyRemoteFiles: リモートのファイルをプロキシするにゃ
proxyRemoteFilesDescription: この設定を有効にすると、未保存または保存容量超過で削除されたリモートファイルをローカルでプロキシし、サムネイルも生成するようににゃるにゃ。サーバーのストレージには影響しにゃいにゃ、
pinnedUsersDescription: List usernames separated by line breaks to be pinned in the "Explore" tab.
pinnedPagesDescription: Enter the paths of the Pages you want to pin to the top page of this instance, separated by line breaks.
pinnedClipId: ID of the clip to pin
avoidMultiCaptchaConfirm: Using multiple Captcha systems may cause interference between them. Would you like to disable the other Captcha systems currently active? If you would like them to stay enabled, press cancel.
name: Jméno
antennaKeywordsDescription: Separate with spaces for an AND condition or with line breaks for an OR condition.
silenceConfirm: Are you sure that you want to silence this user?
unsilenceConfirm: Are you sure that you want to undo the silencing of this user?
notFoundDescription: Nebyla nalezená žádná stránka korespondující se zadanou URL.
title: Titulek
onlyOneFileCanBeAttached: Ke zprávě můžete přiložit jenom jeden soubor
signinFailed: Nelze se přihlásit. Zkontrolujte prosím své uživatelské jméno a heslo.
useOsNativeEmojis: OSネイティブの絵文字を使用
joinOrCreateGroup: Můžete požádat o pozvání do stávající skupiny nebo vytvořit novou.
disableAnimatedMfm: 動きのあるMFMを無効にする
noFollowRequests: You don't have any pending follow requests
objectStorageBaseUrlDesc:
The URL used as reference. Specify the URL of your CDN or Proxy if you are using either.
For S3 use 'https://<bucket>.s3.amazonaws.com' and for GCS or equivalent services use 'https://storage.googleapis.com/<bucket>', etc.
objectStorageBucketDesc: Please specify the bucket name used at your provider.
objectStoragePrefixDesc: Files will be stored under directories with this prefix.
objectStorageEndpointDesc: Leave this empty if you are using AWS S3, otherwise specify the endpoint as '<host>' or '<host>:<port>', depending on the service you are using.
objectStorageRegionDesc: Specify a region like 'xx-east-1'. If your service does not distinguish between regions, leave this blank or enter 'us-east-1'.
objectStorageUseSSLDesc: Turn this off if you are not going to use HTTPS for API connections
objectStorageUseProxyDesc: Turn this off if you are not going to use a Proxy for API connections
showFixedPostForm: Zobrazit formulář pro nové příspěvky nad časovou osou
scratchpadDescription: The Scratchpad provides an environment for AiScript experiments. You can write, execute, and check the results of it interacting with Misskey in it.
deleteAllFilesConfirm: Jste si jistí že chcete smazat všechny soubory?
removeAllFollowingDescription: Executing this unfollows all accounts from {host}. Please run this if the instance e.g. no longer exists.
yourAccountSuspendedDescription: This account has been suspended due to breaking the server's terms of services or similar. Contact the administrator if you would like to know a more detailed reason. Please do not create a new account.
serviceworkerInfo: Must be enabled for push notifications.
author: Autor
leaveConfirm: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them?
pluginTokenRequestedDescription: This plugin will be able to use the permissions set here.
useStarForReactionFallback: Use ★ as fallback if the reaction emoji is unknown
emailConfigInfo: Used to confirm your email during sign-up or if you forget your password
emptyToDisableSmtpAuth: Leave username and password empty to disable SMTP verification
smtpSecure: Use implicit SSL/TLS for SMTP connections
notificationSettingDesc: Select the types of notification to display.
useGlobalSettingDesc: If turned on, your account's notification settings will be used. If turned off, individual configurations can be made.
regenerateLoginTokenDescription: Regenerates the token used internally during login. Normally this action is not necessary. If regenerated, all devices will be logged out.
fillAbuseReportDescription: Please fill in details regarding this report. If it is about a specific note, please include its URL.
abuseReported: Your report has been sent. Thank you very much.
forwardReportIsAnonymous: Instead of your account, an anonymous system account will be displayed as reporter at the remote instance.
editTheseSettingsMayBreakAccount: Editing these settings may damage your account.
i18nInfo: Misskey is being translated into various languages by volunteers. You can help at {link}.
noCrawleDescription: Ask search engines to not index your profile page, notes, Pages, etc.
lockedAccountInfo: Unless you set your note visiblity to "Followers only", your notes will be visible to anyone, even if you require followers to be manually approved.
loadRawImages: Load original images instead of showing thumbnails
verificationEmailSent: A verification email has been sent. Please follow the included link to complete verification.
makeExplorableDescription: If you turn this off, your account will not show up in the "Explore" section.
showGapBetweenNotesInTimeline: Show a gap between posts on the timeline
reloadToApplySetting: This setting will only apply after a page reload. Reload now?
needReloadToApply: A reload is required for this to be reflected.
sendErrorReportsDescription:
When turned on, detailed error information will be shared with Misskey when a problem occurs, helping to improve the quality of Misskey.
This will include information such the version of your OS, what browser you're using, your activity in Misskey, etc.
youAreRunningUpToDateClient: You are using the newest version of your client.
newVersionOfClientAvailable: There is a newer version of your client available.
userPagePinTip: You can display notes here by selecting "Pin to profile" from the menu of individual notes.
notSpecifiedMentionWarning: This note contains mentions of users not included as recipients
hideOnlineStatusDescription: Skrytí vašeho online stavu může snížit funkcionalitu některých funkcí, například vyhledávání.
customCssWarn: This setting should only be used if you know what it does. Entering improper values may cause the client to stop functioning normally.
useBlurEffect: Use blur effects in the UI
accountDeletionInProgress: Account deletion is currently in progress
usernameInfo: A name that identifies your account from others on this server.  You can use the alphabet (a~z, A~Z), digits (0~9) or underscores (_). Usernames cannot be changed later.
makeReactionsPublicDescription: This will make the list of all your past reactions publicly visible.
ffVisibilityDescription: Allows you to configure who can see who you follow and who follows you.
deleteAccountConfirm: This will irreversibly delete your account. Proceed?
leaveGroupConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave "{name}"?
useDrawerReactionPickerForMobile: Display reaction picker as drawer on mobile
clickToFinishEmailVerification: Please click [{ok}] to complete email verification.
emojiSizeFixed: 文字サイズを固定する
duplicateEmoji: 同じ名前の絵文字が存在します。インポートしますか？

_aboutMisskey.about: Misskey is open-source software being developed by syuilo since 2014.
_aboutMisskey.morePatrons: We also appreciate the support of many other helpers not listed here. Thank you! 🥰

_mfm.intro: MFMは、Misskey内の様々にゃ場所で使用できる専用のマークアップ言語にゃ。ここでは、MFMで使用可能にゃ構文一覧が確認できるにゃ。
_mfm.dummy: MisskeyでFediverseの世界が広がります
_mfm.mentionDescription: アットマーク + ユーザー名で、特定のユーザーを示すことができるにゃ。
_mfm.hashtagDescription: ニャンバーサイン + タグで、ハッシュタグを示すことができるにゃ。
_mfm.urlDescription: URLを示すことができるにゃ。
_mfm.linkDescription: 文章の特定の範囲を、URLに紐づけることができるにゃ。
_mfm.boldDescription: 文字を太く表示して強調することができるにゃ。
_mfm.smallDescription: 内容を小さく・薄く表示させることができるにゃ。
_mfm.centerDescription: 内容を中央寄せで表示させることができるにゃ。
_mfm.inlineCodeDescription: プログラムにゃどのコードをインラインでシンタックスハイライトするにゃ。
_mfm.blockCodeDescription: 複数行のプログラムにゃどのコードをブロックでシンタックスハイライトするにゃ。
_mfm.inlineMathDescription: 数式(KaTeX)をインラインで表示するにゃ。
_mfm.blockMathDescription: 複数行の数式(KaTeX)をブロックで表示するにゃ。
_mfm.quoteDescription: 内容が引用であることを示すことができるにゃ。
_mfm.emojiDescription: コロンでカスタム絵文字名を囲むと、カスタム絵文字を表示させることができるにゃ。
_mfm.searchDescription: 入力済み検索ボックスを表示させることができるにゃ。
_mfm.flipDescription: 内容を上下または左右に反転させます。
_mfm.jelly: アニメーション(びよんびよん)
_mfm.jellyDescription: びよんびよんするアニメーションを与えます。
_mfm.tada: アニメーション(じゃーん)
_mfm.tadaDescription: ジャーン！という感じのアニメーションを与えます。
_mfm.jump: アニメーション(ジャンプ)
_mfm.jumpDescription: 飛び跳ねるようにゃアニメーションを与えます。
_mfm.bounce: アニメーション(バウンド)
_mfm.bounceDescription: ぽよんぽよん弾むようにゃアニメーションを与えます。
_mfm.shake: アニメーション(ぶるぶる)
_mfm.shakeDescription: ぶるぶる震えるアニメーションを与えます。
_mfm.twitchDescription: 激しくブレるアニメーションを与えます。
_mfm.spinDescription: 回転するアニメーションを与えます。
_mfm.x2Description: 内容を大きく表示するにゃ。
_mfm.x3Description: 内容をとても大きく表示するにゃ。
_mfm.x4Description: 内容を究極に大きく表示するにゃ。
_mfm.blurDescription: 内容をぼかすことができるにゃ。ポインターを上に乗せるとはっきり見えるようににゃるにゃ。
_mfm.fontDescription: 内容のフォントを指定することができるにゃ。
_mfm.rainbowDescription: 内容をレインボーにするにゃ。
_mfm.sparkleDescription: キラキラしたパーティクルのエフェクトを追加するにゃ。
_mfm.rotateDescription: 指定した角度で回転させます。

_reversi.thisGameIsStartedSoon: 対局は数秒後に開始されます
_reversi.waitingForOther: 相手の準備が完了するのを待っているにゃ
_reversi.waitingForMe: あにゃたの準備が完了するのを待っているにゃ
_reversi.waitingBoth: 準備してくださいにゃ
_reversi.myTurn: あにゃたのターンにゃ
_reversi.isLlotheo: 石の少にゃい方が勝ち(ロセオ)
_reversi.canPutEverywhere: どこでも置けるモード

_wordMute.muteWordsDescription: Separate with spaces for an AND condition or with line breaks for an OR condition.
_wordMute.muteWordsDescription2: Surround keywords with slashes to use regular expressions.
_wordMute.softDescription: Hide notes that fulfil the set conditions from the timeline.
_wordMute.hardDescription: Prevents notes fulfilling the set conditions from being added to the timeline. In addition, these notes will not be added to the timeline even if the conditions are changed.

_instanceMute.instanceMuteDescription: This will mute any notes/renotes from the listed instances, including those of users replying to a user from a muted instance.
_instanceMute.title: Hides notes from listed instances.
_instanceMute.heading: List of instances to be muted

_theme.invalid: The format of this theme is invalid
_theme.inputConstantName: Enter a name for this constant
_theme.importInfo: If you enter theme code here, you can import it to the theme editor
_theme.deleteConstantConfirm: Do you really want to delete the constant {const}?

_sfx.reversiPutBlack: リバーシ: 黒が打ったとき
_sfx.reversiPutWhite: リバーシ: 白が打ったとき

_tutorial.title: How to use Misskey
_tutorial.step1_2: This page is called the "timeline". It shows chronologically ordered "notes" of people who you "follow".
_tutorial.step1_3: Your timeline is currently empty, since you have not posted any notes or followed anyone yet.
_tutorial.step2_1: Let's finish setting up your profile before writing a note or following anyone.
_tutorial.step2_2: Providing some information about who you are will make it easier for others to tell if they want to see your notes or follow you.
_tutorial.step3_2: Then let's try posting a note next. You can do so by pressing the button with a pencil icon on the screen.
_tutorial.step3_3: Fill in the modal and press the button on the top right to post.
_tutorial.step3_4: Have nothing to say? Try "just setting up my msky"!
_tutorial.step4_2: Hurray! Now your first note should be displayed on your timeline.
_tutorial.step5_1: Now, let's try making your timeline more lively by following other people.
_tutorial.step5_2: {featured} will show you popular notes in this instance. {explore} will let you find popular users. Try finding people you'd like to follow there!
_tutorial.step5_3: To follow other users, click on their icon and press the "Follow" button on their profile.
_tutorial.step5_4: If the other user has a lock icon next to their name, it may take some time for that user to manually approve your follow request.
_tutorial.step6_1: You should be able to see other users' notes on your timeline now.
_tutorial.step6_2: You can also put "reactions" on other people's notes to quickly respond to them.
_tutorial.step6_3: To attach a "reaction", press the "+" mark on another user's note and choose an emoji you'd like to react with.
_tutorial.step7_1: Congratulations! You have now finished Misskey's basic tutorial.
_tutorial.step7_2: If you would like to learn more about Misskey, try the {help} section.
_tutorial.step7_3: Now then, have fun with Misskey! 🚀
_tutorial.step8_1: Lastly, would you like to enable push notifications?
_tutorial.step9_2: このインスタンスではガラス風デザインを標準で採用しています。
_tutorial.step9_3: 端末によってはパフォーマンスが低下する場合があります。
_tutorial.step9_4: その場合は設定よりブラーを使用しないように設定＋テーマをNoGlassにしてください。
_tutorial.step8_2: Enabling these will allow you to receive notifications for mentions, reactions, follows, etc. even when Misskey is not opened.
_tutorial.step8_3: You can always change this setting later.

_2fa.alreadyRegistered: You have already registered a 2-factor authentication device.
_2fa.step1: First, install an authentication app (such as {a} or {b}) on your device.
_2fa.step2: Then, scan the QR code displayed on this screen.
_2fa.step3: Enter the token provided by your app to finish setup.
_2fa.step4: From now on, any future login attempts will ask for such a login token.
_2fa.securityKeyInfo: Besides fingerprint or PIN authentication, you can also setup authentication via hardware security keys that support FIDO2 to further secure your account.
_2fa.step2Url: You can also enter this URL if you're using a desktop program:

poweredByMisskeyDescription: {name} is one of the services powered by the open source platform Misskey (referred to as a "Misskey instance").
reactionSetting: Reactions to show in the reaction picker
flagShowTimelineRepliesDescription: Je-li zapnuto, zobrazí odpovědi uživatelů na poznámky jiných uživatelů na vaší časové ose.
regexpErrorDescription: An error occurred in the regular expression on line {line} of your {tab} word mutes:
confirmToUnclipAlreadyClippedNote: This note is already part of the "{name}" clip. Do you want to remove it from this clip instead?
instanceDefaultThemeDescription: Enter the theme code in object format.
reflectMayTakeTime: Může trvat nějakou dobu, než se projeví změny.
cropImageAsk: Do you want to crop this image?
driveCapOverrideLabel: Change the drive capacity for this user
driveCapOverrideCaption: Reset the capacity to default by inputting a value of 0 or lower.
requireAdminForView: You must log in with an administrator account to view this.
isSystemAccount: An account created and automatically operated by the system.
numberOfPageCacheDescription: Increasing this number will improve convenience for users but cause more server load as well as more memory to be used.
label: Label
cannotUploadBecauseInappropriate: This file could not be uploaded because parts of it have been detected as potentially NSFW.
cannotUploadBecauseNoFreeSpace: Upload failed due to lack of Drive capacity.
enableAutoSensitiveDescription: Allows automatic detection and marking of NSFW media through Machine Learning where possible. Even if this option is disabled, it may be enabled instance-wide.
activeEmailValidationDescription: Enables stricter validation of email addresses, which includes checking for disposable addresses and by whether it can actually be communicated with. When unchecked, only the format of the email is validated.
pushNotificationNotSupported: Your browser or instance does not support push notifications
sendPushNotificationReadMessage: Delete push notifications once the relevant notifications or messages have been read
sendPushNotificationReadMessageCaption: A notification containing the text "{emptyPushNotificationMessage}" will be displayed for a short time. This may increase the battery usage of your device, if applicable.
caption: Caption
didYouLikeMisskey: Have you taken a liking to Misskey?
pleaseDonate: {host} uses the free software, Misskey. We would highly appreciate your donations so development of Misskey can continue!
cannotPerformTemporaryDescription: This action cannot be performed temporarily due to exceeding the execution limit. Please wait for a while and then try again.
gotInvalidResponseErrorDescription: The server may be unreachable or undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.
collapseRenotes: 見たことのあるRenoteを省略して表示
internalServerErrorDescription: サーバー内部で予期しないエラーが発生しました。

_myNoteFavorited1.title: Seeking Stars
_myNoteFavorited1.description: Have somebody else favorite one of your notes

_markedAsCat.title: I Am a Cat
_markedAsCat.description: Mark your account as a cat
_markedAsCat.flavor: I'll give you a name later.

_viewAchievements3min.title: Likes Achievements
_viewAchievements3min.description: Look at your list of achievements for at least 3 minutes

_iLoveMisskey.title: I Love Misskey
_iLoveMisskey.flavor: Misskey's development team greatly appreciates your support!

_noteDeletedWithin1min.title: Nevermind
_noteDeletedWithin1min.description: Delete a note within a minute of posting it

_postedAtLateNight.title: Nocturnal
_postedAtLateNight.description: Post a note late at night
_postedAtLateNight.flavor: It's about time to go to bed.

_htl20npm.title: Flowing Timeline
_htl20npm.description: Have the speed of your home timeline exceed 20 npm (notes per minute)

_open3windows.title: Multi-Window
_open3windows.description: Have at least 3 windows open at the same time

_driveFolderCircularReference.title: Circular Reference
_driveFolderCircularReference.description: Attempt to create a recursively nested folder in Drive

_reactWithoutRead.title: Did you really read that?
_reactWithoutRead.description: React on a note that's over 100 characters long within 3 seconds of it being posted

_justPlainLucky.title: Just Plain Lucky
_justPlainLucky.description: Has a chance to be obtained with a probability of 0.01% every 10 seconds

_passedSinceAccountCreated1.title: One Year Anniversary
_passedSinceAccountCreated1.description: One year has passed since your account was created

_passedSinceAccountCreated2.title: Two Year Anniversary
_passedSinceAccountCreated2.description: Two years have passed since your account was created

_passedSinceAccountCreated3.title: Three Year Anniversary
_passedSinceAccountCreated3.description: Three years have passed since your account was created

_loggedInOnNewYearsDay.title: Happy New Year!
_loggedInOnNewYearsDay.description: Logged in on the first day of the year
_loggedInOnNewYearsDay.flavor: To another great year on this instance

_cookieClicked.title: A game in which you click cookies
_cookieClicked.flavor: Wait, are you on the correct website?

_brainDiver.title: Brain Diver
_brainDiver.description: Post the link to Brain Diver

_role.name: Role name
_role.descriptionOfPermission: Moderators can perform basic moderation operations. Administrators can change all settings of the instance.
_role.descriptionOfAssignTarget: Manual to manually change who is part of this role and who is not. Conditional to have users be automatically assigned and removed from this role based on a condition.
_role.descriptionOfIsPublic: Anyone will be able to view a list of users assigned to this role. In addition, this role will be displayed in the profiles of assigned users.
_role.descriptionOfAsBadge: This role's icon will be displayed next to the username of users with this role if turned on.
_role.canEditMembersByModerator: Allow moderators to edit the list of members for this role
_role.descriptionOfCanEditMembersByModerator: When turned on, moderators as well as administrators will be able to assign and unassign users to this role. When turned off, only administrators will be able to assign users.

_options.wordMuteMax: Maximum number of characters allowed in word mutes
_options.noteEachClipsMax: Maximum number of notes within a clip
_options.userEachUserListsMax: Maximum number of users within a user list
_options.descriptionOfRateLimitFactor: Lower rate limits are less restrictive, higher ones more restrictive.

_condition.createdLessThan: Less than X has passed since account creation
_condition.createdMoreThan: More than X has passed since account creation

_sensitiveMediaDetection.description: Reduces the effort of server moderation through automatically recognizing NSFW media via Machine Learning. This will slightly increase the load on the server.
_sensitiveMediaDetection.sensitivityDescription: Reducing the sensitivity will lead to fewer misdetections (false positives) whereas increasing it will lead to fewer missed detections (false negatives).
_sensitiveMediaDetection.setSensitiveFlagAutomaticallyDescription: The results of the internal detection will be retained even if this option is turned off.
_sensitiveMediaDetection.analyzeVideosDescription: Analyzes videos in addition to images. This will slightly increase the load on the server.

_preferencesBackups.inputName: Please enter a name for this backup
_preferencesBackups.nameAlreadyExists: A backup called "{name}" already exists. Please enter a different name.
_preferencesBackups.applyConfirm: Do you really want to apply the "{name}" backup to this device? Existing settings of this device will be overwritten.
_preferencesBackups.noBackups: No backups exist. You may backup your client settings on this server by using "Create new backup".
